member.name: TrustLevel
member.summary: Represents the trust level of an activatable class.

member.name: TrustLevel.BaseTrust
member.summary: The component has access to resources that are not protected.

member.name: TrustLevel.PartialTrust
member.summary: The component has access to resources requested in the app manifest and approved by the user.

member.name: TrustLevel.FullTrust
member.summary: The component requires the full privileges of the user.
